TargetSwitchTimer.Description: Minimum time the NPC will be locked onto a single target before switching

AttackSequence.Description: The attack sequence to use in combat

AttackDistance.Description: The distance at which an NPC will execute attacks

TargetRange.Description: The distance the target needs to be within to maintain priority over other targets

CombatRelativeTurnSpeed.Description: Modifier that decides turn speed difference in combat

MaintainDistance.Description: Whether this NPC should try to maintain distance to the target

MaintainDistanceRange.Description: The distance within which the distance maintaining logic will kick in

MoveThreshold.Description: Threshold outside the desired distance range before NPC will move to maintain distance

StrafingDurationRange.Description: How long to strafe for when strafing

RelativeForwardsSpeed.Description: Relative forwards move speed when maintaining distance

RelativeBackwardsSpeed.Description: Relative backwards move speed when maintaining distance
